body.subject: Epic 28 approved - deployment unblocked, ready for staged rollout
body.summary: Quality engineer approved Epic 28 with release_gate: true. All quality gates passed: coverage 85% unit, 80% integration, test evidence complete, architecture compliant, security validated, performance targets met, all 12 AC covered. Deployment unblocked. Ready for staged rollout per deployment.json (staging → canary → production).
key_points: Epic 28 approved: release_gate: true, deployment unblocked
All quality gates passed: coverage 85% unit, 80% integration (exceeds 80% requirement), test evidence complete (91 unit, 25 integration, 7 security, 3 performance, 5 smoke tests)
Architecture compliant: Clean Architecture verified, no layer boundary violations
Security validated: input sanitization tests pass, no external SaaS dependencies
Performance targets met: memory < 150ms, intent < 5s, multi-step < 30s
Deployment strategy: staged rollout (staging → canary → production) per deployment.json
Monitoring ready: 6 Prometheus metrics, 3 Grafana dashboards, 7 alerts, 2 health checks
Rollback plans ready: per-task, full, partial
concerns: Monitor deployment metrics during staged rollout
Validate health checks at each stage (staging → canary → production)
Watch for rollback triggers: error rate > 1%, latency p99 > 30s, health check failures > 10%
Ensure shared infra services (MongoDB, Prometheus, LLM API) remain operational
body.action_needed: Unblock deployment and start staged rollout per deployment.json. Stage 1: Deploy to staging environment, validate all smoke tests pass, performance targets met, health checks pass. Stage 2: Deploy to production canary (10% traffic), monitor for 2 hours, validate metrics within normal range. Stage 3: Deploy to full production (100% traffic), monitor for 4 hours. Monitor Prometheus metrics: god_agent_tasks_total, god_agent_plan_duration_seconds, god_agent_veto_total, god_agent_skill_latency_seconds. Use rollback plans if triggers activated.
